author: ehatcher
msg: SOLR-120: Add persistent HTTP connections. (contributed by Coda Hale).
Also, some additional commenting and cleanup.

author: scheu
msg: AsyncResponse.get() now caches the returned object.  This avoids a reparse of the message.  Updated ParallelAsyncTests to validate

author: rjung
msg: - Allow a user of a read/write status worker to switch it to and
- Do not show read/write commands in a read_only status worker.
